>@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Item.sobLlAGQkmWcFBFx]{Magic Hack}

You gain the @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.feats.Item.cloPjyXmg0zrvKaR]{Shield Proficiency} feat (Character Operations Manual 118). As a swift action, you can create an area of solid energy that appears in one of your hands to use as a shield. The phase shield has no bulk but otherwise functions as a @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.equipment.Item.5StvdJoJWWBC5Maf]{Basic Tactical Shield}; you can dismiss the shield as a swift action, and it disappears at the end of your turn if you aren’t holding it. Your phase shield can’t benefit from weapon fusions; it can be sundered and you can be disarmed of it, but this doesn’t prevent you from recreating it in your hand on a later turn.

At 8th level, your phase shield functions as a @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.equipment.Item.16rv6RPagMF3m7xp]{Field Tactical Shield}. At 11th level, it functions as an @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.equipment.Item.6HUhhNElKX5xZS5C]{Advanced Tactical Shield}. At 14th level, it functions as an @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.equipment.Item.V4PBBLSA3ddR5EPP]{Elite Tactical Shield}, and at 17th level, it functions as a @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.equipment.Item.saSjb9IzKiHkuMs8]{Paragon Tactical Shield}.
